translation.en: [Joe] Well, hello there.
Who are you?
Based on your vibe, a student.
Your blouse is loose.
You're not here to be ogled, but those bracelets, they jangle.
translation.de: Du willst nicht begafft werden, aber deine Armreife klimpern.

translation.en: You like a little attention.
Okay, I bite.
You search the books. Fiction, "F" through "K."
translation.de: Du durchstöberst die Bücher, Romane, "F" bis "K".

translation.en: Now...
Hmm, you're not the standard insecure nymph hunting for Faulkner you'll never finish.
translation.de: ...die Klischeenymphe, die Faulkner kauft, um ihn nie zu lesen, bist du nicht.

translation.en: Too sun-kissed for Stephen King.
Who will you buy?
[Beck gasps] Sorry.
[Joe] You sound apologetic, like you're embarrassed to be a good girl,
translation.de: Du klingst defensiv, als sei es dir peinlich, so brav zu sein,

translation.en: and you murmur your first word to me.
translation.de: und du flüsterst mir dein erstes Wort zu.

translation.en: Hello.
Do you work here?
Guilty.
-Can I help you find something? -Paula Fox.
It's a good choice.
Hmm, I feel weirdly validated.
[chuckles] Follow me.
She's gonna be in here.
"Celebrity authors"? I thought Fox was pretty obscure.
translation.de: "Starautoren?" Ich hielt Fox für ziemlich unbekannt.

translation.en: She is Courtney Love's maternal grandmother.
translation.de: Sie ist Courtney Loves Oma mütterlicherseits.

translation.en: You're not expected to know that.
Good. I didn't.
Mr. Mooney wants anyone in here who's even tangentially famous.
translation.de: Mr. Mooney will hier alle, die entfernt berühmt sind.

translation.en: He thinks it sells more books.
That's sad.
People buying books because of what's popular,
and not because they wanna be moved or changed in some way.
translation.de: und nicht, um sich anrühren oder verändern zu lassen.

translation.en: Yeah. It's an epidemic.
Yeah, you see this guy? Here, the glasses, behind you.
translation.de: Siehst du den Typen da? Mit Brille, hinter dir.

translation.en: He just grabbed Dan Brown's latest on the way in.
translation.de: Er nahm sich den neuen Dan Brown, als er hereinkam.

translation.en: So he's gonna wander around for another, like, five or ten minutes,
translation.de: Jetzt wandert er noch fünf oder zehn Minuten umher,

translation.en: just to find something legitimate to buy with it.
Oh, like the cereal guys buy when they're really there for condoms.
translation.de: Wie die Kerle, die zu Kondomen Müsli kaufen.

translation.en: Only makes it more conspicuous. Like, own your shit.
translation.de: Was es nur auffälliger macht. Gebt es doch zu.

translation.en: If Dan Brown's your kink, then be out about it.
translation.de: Wenn du auf Dan Brown stehst, leb es aus.

translation.en: [scoffs] At the end of the day, people really are disappointing, aren't they?
translation.de: Letztlich sind Menschen doch enttäuschend, oder?

translation.en: Sometimes they surprise you.
-Paula Fox. Top shelf. You want me to... -Oh, no, I got it.
translation.de: -Paula Fox. Ganz oben. Soll ich... -Das schaffe ich.

translation.en: [Joe] Oh. Are you not wearing a bra?
And you want me to notice.
If this was a movie,
I'd grab you and we'd go at it right in the stacks.
translation.de: würden wir jetzt zwischen den Regalen übereinander herfallen.

translation.en: Have you read her fiction? Desperate Characters, it's her best.
translation.de: Kennst du ihre Bücher? Was am Ende bleibt ist am besten.

translation.en: [sighs] That's what I keep hearing.
-You haven't read Desperate Characters? -I know. I know.
I'm worried it's not gonna live up to the hype.
I can safely say it is that good.
That's a high endorsement. And from a bookstore clerk, nonetheless.
Well, it's bookstore manager.
Hello? Anyone working here?
-Asshole. -Mmm...
Do you mind? Uh, I'm in a hurry.
[Joe] He's just pissed he's gotta buy Salinger to feel respectable
translation.de: Es nervt ihn, zum Schein Salinger zu kaufen,

translation.en: when all he really wants to do is eat Cheetos and jerk it to iPorn
translation.de: wenn er nichts anderes will als Cheetos essen, wichsen

translation.en: before washing it all down with a Dan Brown chaser.
translation.de: und alles mit einem reißerischen Dan Brown herunterspülen.

translation.en: Have a nice day, sir.
Okay, I'm going for it.
-Good. You won't regret it. -I'd better not.
Paula Fox. Nice.
You know, she was, uh, Courtney Love's maternal grandmother.
That's why I'm buying it.
[Joe] You have enough cash to cover this, but you want me to know your name.
translation.de: Du hast genug Bargeld dabei, aber ich soll deinen Namen wissen.

translation.en: -"Guinevere"? -Yeah.
My parents were assholes with the whole naming thing.
translation.de: Meine Eltern hatten echt einen Knall bei Namen.

translation.en: But everyone just calls me Beck.
And you're Joe...
Everyone calls me Joe.
Aren't you gonna tell me to have a nice day?
translation.de: Mir wünschst du keinen schönen Tag?

translation.en: You have a nice day, Beck.
You have one yourself, Joe.
[Joe] You smiled, laughed at my jokes,
translation.de: Du hast gelächelt, über meine Witze gelacht,

translation.en: told me your name, asked for mine.
translation.de: mir deinen Namen gesagt, nach meinem gefragt.

translation.en: She write her number on there? She was on you hard.
translation.de: Steht ihre Nummer drauf? Die ging ja ganz schön ran.

translation.en: No, she was just being nice.
I'd be googling the hell out of her right now.
You know her full name.
That's pretty aggressive, Ethan.
What do I tell you? Always be closing that shit.
translation.de: Was sage ich dir immer? Komm zum Abschluss.

translation.en: [both] If you need me, I'll be in cookbooks.
But for work. Not for fun. I swear.
[Joe] At the end of the day, people are really just disappointing, aren't they?
translation.de: Letztlich sind Menschen wirklich enttäuschend, oder?

translation.en: But are you, Beck? Are you?
Yes, people find "the one."
I believe that. I try to stay open.
translation.de: Ich glaube daran. Ich versuche, dafür offen zu sein.

translation.en: I was in love once. She broke my heart, Beck.
translation.de: Ich war mal verliebt. Sie brach mir das Herz.

translation.en: Ugh, she really did a number on me.
translation.de: Sie hat mich ganz krass gelinkt.

translation.en: I should've seen the signs.
But we never do when we're in love.
-Exhibit A. Claudia and Ron. -[indistinct arguing]
[Ron] I went out for a couple of drinks. Get off my back.
translation.de: Ich war nur was trinken. Lass mich in Ruhe.

translation.en: [Joe] Claudia's a nurse. Single parent.
[Claudia] Leave me alone! You're on your phone...
[Joe] You think she knew Ron was a shitbag when she fell in love?
translation.de: Wusste sie etwa, dass sie sich in einen Scheißkerl verliebt?

translation.en: No, she thought he was a prince.
'Sup, Joe?
[Joe] And now,
-hers is not the only life she ruined. -[Claudia] Leave me alone!
translation.de: -ist nicht nur ihr Leben kaputt. -Verpiss dich!

translation.en: Why is coming home such a chore for you? [continues indistinctly]
translation.de: Was ist so schwer daran heimzukommen?

translation.en: Is everything cool in there?
Yeah, Mom and Ron are just talking. [Claudia] You always go out with your friends!
translation.de: -Mom und Ron reden halt. -Du gehst ständig aus!

translation.en: -And I'm sick of it! -Wow.
You are burning through that book, aren't you?
Reads quick. It's good.
translation.de: Liest sich schnell. Es ist gut.

translation.en: Let me know when you finish. I'll get you another one.
translation.de: DIE DREI MUSKETIERE Ich besorge dann Nachschub.

translation.en: [Claudia] Screw you, Ron! Get out of here! Leave me alone.
translation.de: Du kannst mich mal, Ron! Raus! Verpiss dich.

translation.en: Are you hungry?
'Cause, you know, I just got this meatball sub,
but I remembered I have Thai from last night.
translation.de: dabei habe ich noch Thai übrig.

translation.en: Nah. My mom will just make me something later.
translation.de: Meine Mom kocht mir nachher was.

translation.en: That's a shame. This won't keep. It's getting tossed.
translation.de: Schade. Es hält sich nicht. Ab in den Müll.

translation.en: You sure, Joe?
"All for one and one for all."
translation.de: "Einer für alle und alle für einen."

translation.en: [Joe] The point, Beck... Love is, uh, tricky.
translation.de: Der Punkt ist, Beck... Liebe ist kompliziert.

translation.en: [Joe] A guy needs to protect himself.
translation.de: Als Mann muss man sich schützen.

translation.en: I had to be sure you're safe.
translation.de: Ich musste sichergehen, dass du in Ordnung bist.

translation.en: And your name was a glorious place to start.
translation.de: Dein Name war ein toller Ausgangspunkt.

translation.en: Not a lot of Guinevere Becks.
translation.de: Guinevere Becks gibt es nicht viele.

translation.en: And there you were. Every account set to public.
translation.de: Da warst du. Alle Accounts öffentlich.

translation.en: You want to be seen, heard, known.
translation.de: Du willst gesehen, gehört, gekannt werden.

translation.en: Of course, I obliged.
Born and raised, Nantucket Island.
A brother, Clyde, and sister, Anya.
translation.de: Ein Bruder und eine Schwester, Clyde und Anya.

translation.en: Your parents really were assholes about the names.
translation.de: Deine Eltern hatten echt einen Knall mit Namen.

translation.en: Your folks split when you were 12. Your dad dropped out of the picture.
translation.de: Trennung, als du 12 warst. Dad machte die Fliege.

translation.en: Went to Brown where you majored in lit. Cool.
And minored in douchebags. Hmm.
And then on to NYC to conquer an MFA and make your mark, presumably.
translation.de: Dann ab nach New York, Masterstudium, dir einen Namen machen.

translation.en: Now you still write. Barely.
translation.de: Und du schreibst noch. Aber kaum.

translation.en: Too busy living out moments you won't remember five years from now.
translation.de: Du lebst Momente, von denen nichts bleibt.

translation.en: I know this because you post about this life all the goddamn time.
translation.de: Das weiß ich, weil du immer nur über dieses Leben postest.

translation.en: [Joe] Candidly, it's the least appealing thing about you, Beck.
translation.de: Das ist das am wenigsten Einnehmende an dir.

translation.en: You posted this hours after our encounter.
translation.de: Das hast du nach unserem Treffen gepostet.

translation.en: [Joe] I was concerned you didn't mention that cute guy in a bookstore.
translation.de: Ich war besorgt, weil der süße Buchhändler fehlte.

translation.en: And then I realized your online life isn't real.
translation.de: Dann begriff ich, dein Online-Leben ist nicht echt.

translation.en: It's a collage.
You paste this Beck up. This...
together, lovable, cute, bendy little creature.
If anything, the fact that you didn't share me with your followers
only confirms we really connected.
translation.de: wenn überhaupt, auf unsere echte Verbundenheit.

translation.en: The next thing our little friend the Internet gave me was your address.
translation.de: Als Nächstes gab mir das liebe Internet deine Adresse.

translation.en: There it is, with its big, naked windows.
translation.de: Da ist es, große, nackte Fenster.

translation.en: It's nice. Too nice.
I'm thinking subsidized school housing.
Jesus! It's like you've never seen a horror movie or the news.
translation.de: Himmel! Als hättest du nie Horrorfilme oder die Nachrichten gesehen.

translation.en: But you want people to watch, don't you?
translation.de: Aber du willst ja gesehen werden.

translation.en: You know, I plan on asking you about this quality
when we get to know each other better.
A proposal.
Why don't we spend the day together tomorrow?
Just you and me?
[Beck] To everyone out there chasing their dreams, don't give up.
translation.de: An alle, die ihren Träumen nachjagen: Gebt nicht auf.

translation.en: And in the meantime, mac and cheese!
translation.de: Und bis dahin: Makkaroni mit Käse!

translation.en: [Joe] It's cute. Not deep. But cute. Is there more to you? Let's find out.
translation.de: Süß. Nicht tiefsinnig. Aber süß. Hast du mehr zu bieten? Finden wir es heraus.

translation.en: Our day starts at the ass-crack of dawn.
I know from your posted schedule that you teach a 6:30 class
translation.de: Laut deiner Agenda gibst du um 6:30 Uhr

translation.en: called Get Up N Flow.
You caress the sweaty backs of bulimic, dead-eyed real mommies of SoHo...
translation.de: Du streichelst schwitzenden, bulimischen Mamis aus SoHo den Rücken...

translation.en: I am loving your form today, Tasha.
[Joe] ...offering smiles and lies of encouragement.
[Joe] By 10:00, you're at campus to TA a Romantics class
translation.de: Um 10 Uhr bist du Assistentin im Kurs zur Romantik

translation.en: and play Vanna White to some shirt.
Morning, Professor Leahy.
I told you, it's Paul. Are you ready for class?
translation.de: Für dich Paul. Bereit für den Unterricht?

translation.en: [Joe] Professor Obvious wants to fuck you.
Now, you're smart. You let him think one day he might.
translation.de: Du bist aber klug. Du lässt ihm seine Hoffnungen.

translation.en: And what's the harm in that, right?
After class, you head to your favorite café
translation.de: Nach der Stunde gehst du in dein Lieblingscafé,

translation.en: to write for the first time all day.
translation.de: um zum ersten Mal heute zu schreiben.

translation.en: But your life doesn't cooperate.
Your wealthy girlfriends have just now woken up,
and have nothing better to do
translation.de: und haben nichts Besseres zu tun,

translation.en: than plan their next pointless yet instagrammable night.
translation.de: als die nächste sinnlose, aber postbare Nacht zu planen.

translation.en: Can we get real for a second?
You have questionable taste in friends, Beck.
translation.de: Bei Freunden hast du einen fragwürdigen Geschmack.

translation.en: -[all] Cheers! -Yeah!
-Oh, yes. Happy birthday! -[Annika laughs] Thank you so much.
[Joe] And expensive taste in lives.
translation.de: Und in Sachen Leben ist er teuer.

translation.en: -Ready? -Thank you.
-[gasps] -Do you like it?
No, I hate it. Of course I love it!
translation.de: Nein, grässlich. Natürlich gefällt es mir!

translation.en: Jason didn't even get her something that nice,
translation.de: So was Schönes hatte nicht mal Jason,

translation.en: and Annika finally let him do anal.
translation.de: dabei erlaubt ihm Annika endlich anal.

translation.en: -[Lynn] Oh, my God! -Please, please, it was time.
Please open my gift next and tell me how much you hate me then, lady.
translation.de: Öffne mein Geschenk, dann hasst du mich nicht mehr.

translation.en: A butterfly? It's my spirit animal for the year. You remembered?
translation.de: Ein Schmetterling? Mein Geisttier des Jahres. Das weißt du noch?

translation.en: Only 'cause you wouldn't shut up about it.
[Joe] You want so badly to be one of them.
translation.de: Du willst so gern so sein wie sie.

translation.en: -[Beck] Happy birthday. -[Annika] You look so beautiful.
[Joe] Well, they've got nothing to do after this.
So, yeah, they'll party till 5:00 and scrape it together tomorrow.
translation.de: Sie werden ewig feiern und sich morgen berappeln.

translation.en: But you can't. You have to work for a living.
translation.de: Das kannst du nicht. Du arbeitest.

translation.en: A McQueen, Beck? How much was it?
translation.de: Ein McQueen? Wie teuer war es?

translation.en: [chuckles] It was on clearance.
They haven't put a McQueen scarf on clearance
translation.de: Seine Tücher waren nicht im Angebot,

translation.en: since he hung himself in 2010.
It'd be too much even if she did deserve it,
translation.de: Zu teuer, selbst wenn sie es verdient hätte,

translation.en: which she does not.
[Joe] Hmm. Not all your friends are dumb.
translation.de: Deine Freundinnen sind nicht alle doof.

translation.en: [Peach] You always do this.
You make, like, a big gesture that you can't afford because...
translation.de: Große Gesten, die du dir nicht leisten kannst, weil...

translation.en: -[scoffs] I'm sorry, you're too nice. -It's no big deal. I had, um, a gift card.
translation.de: -Du bist zu lieb. -Passt schon. Ich hatte einen Gutschein.

translation.en: How broke are you?
Just tell me what's up.
[Joe] Actually sounds like she cares.
[Beck] Look, I appreciate--
[Peach] Why don't you just let me loan you some cash?
translation.de: Lass mich dir doch etwas leihen?

translation.en: Okay? I keep telling you, it's nothing.
[Joe] Also, sounds condescending.
You know I'd do anything for you. Don't forget that.
translation.de: Ich würde alles für dich tun. Denk dran.

translation.en: -Sure you can't come out with us? -I gotta write.
translation.de: -Du willst sicher nicht mit? -Ich muss schreiben.

translation.en: Virtuous. Catch you later?
[Joe] Is that the best friend you've got?
translation.de: Eine bessere Freundin hast du nicht?

translation.en: If so, Beck, you really are alone.
Your social media's a liar.
translation.de: In den sozialen Medien lügst du.

translation.en: It says you're a happy-go-lucky dilettante.
translation.de: Da bist du eine sorglose Dilettantin.

translation.en: But, underneath it all, you seem like the genuine article.
translation.de: Aber hinter der Fassade scheinst du es echt draufzuhaben.

translation.en: Stretched ADD thin, sure, but as soon as the door closes...
translation.de: Leichtes ADS, klar, aber kaum fällt die Tür ins Schloss,

translation.en: you're back at the keyboard, trying to write.
translation.de: bist du am PC, um zu schreiben.

translation.en: [man] Thanks.
Keep the change, man.
Hey. Let me up.
[Joe] Uh, Beck, who the fuck is this?
My best friend walked in on you getting your dick sucked
by some random woman in a bathroom at a party that I took you to!
translation.de: beim Blowjob auf dem Klo, auf die Party hatte ich dich eingeladen!

translation.en: I was wasted. I didn't even finish.
translation.de: Ich war besoffen. Ich habe dann aufgehört.

translation.en: That's your apology? "I didn't cum." That's the one you're going with?
translation.de: Tolle Entschuldigung. "Ich bin nicht gekommen." Echt?

translation.en: I obviously shouldn't have gone in the bathroom
with any girl that wasn't you.
translation.de: außer dir aufs Klo gehen sollen.

translation.en: But she said she had good coke, and I'd been seriously stressed.
translation.de: Aber sie bot mir gutes Koks, und ich war so gestresst.

translation.en: I thought, when Johno and I started our line,
translation.de: Als Johno und ich die Firma gründeten,

translation.en: it was gonna be like picking out flavors and shit.
It turns out it's 16-hour lectures on microbial management.
translation.de: Jetzt höre ich ellenlange Vorträge über Bakterien.

translation.en: And that's why no one starts their own artisanal soda company,
and why America has to keep drinking crap that's giving 'em cancer.
You actually managed to connect your illicit blowjob to curing cancer.
translation.de: Du schaffst es, deinen Blowjob mit Krebstherapie zu verknüpfen.

translation.en: I'm genuinely impressed.
Beck, I...
Seriously, I am drowning in work.
I don't have time to keep hooking up or whatever it is you're even capable of.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Zeit, mit dir irgendwie rumzuvögeln.

translation.en: I know I've done some stupid shit, but I'm on it now.
translation.de: Ich weiß, ich habe Mist gebaut, aber ich bin jetzt in der Spur.

translation.en: I don't wanna be just some guy you sleep with.
translation.de: Ich will nicht nur ein Typ sein, mit dem du schläfst.

translation.en: [whispering] God, you make me insane.
[Joe] Way to go, Beck. Looks like a catch.
Benjamin J. Ashby III. Oh, there's three of them.
translation.de: Benjamin J. Ashby III. Es gibt drei.

translation.en: Greenwich-born, boarding-school bred.
His father is the Ben Ashby of Ashby Brokerage.
translation.de: Sein Vater ist der Ben Ashby von Ashby Brokerage.

translation.en: Two failed careers. Model. Oh, boy.
translation.de: Gescheitert in zwei Berufen. Model. Oje.

translation.en: And co-creator of a dating app
that connects people through musical tastes called LoveHooks.
translation.de: die Leute über Musikgeschmack verbindet, heißt LoveHooks.

translation.en: Current CEO of Home Soda Artisanal Beverages.
translation.de: Aktuell CEO von Home Soda Artisanale Getränke.

translation.en: Motto...
"Drink better by hand," which makes no sense,
but evokes a homespun quality
that lines up with a guy who wears $600 Japanese sneakers.
translation.de: das super zu seinen japanischen Sneakers für $600 passt.

translation.en: The hair, the privilege he tries to hide with retweets of Black Lives Matter.
translation.de: Frisur, Privilegien, die er versteckt mit Retweets von Black Lives Matter.

translation.en: Not to sound judgey, but this guy is everything wrong with America.
translation.de: In dem bündelt sich alles, was in Amerika schiefläuft.

translation.en: See, this is why I do my research.
You fall for the wrong men.
Bad men.
You let them in. You let them hurt you.
Too far away to know for sure, but my guess is,
translation.de: Bin zu weit weg, aber hätte er dich

translation.en: if he came anywhere close to making you cum,
you would've made a Broadway show out of it.
But you didn't, 'cause he didn't.
translation.de: Hast du aber nicht, denn er hat nicht.

translation.en: -"Desperate Characters." -Yeah, I just got it.
translation.de: -"Was am Ende bleibt." -Habe ich gerade gekauft.

translation.en: Borrow it when I'm done. It's supposed to be her best.
translation.de: Du kannst es leihen. Soll ihr bestes sein.

translation.en: Johno's consultant we brought in,
she's been all over me about this kind of thing.
Saged the crap out of the office.
The book title has the word "desperate" in it.
You don't want to think of yourself as a desperate character, Beck.
translation.de: Du bist aber nicht am Ende.

translation.en: Because you're the opposite, babe.
You're the smartest girl I know.
Honestly, you blow me away.
Oh, shit. Gotta roll. Johno's blowing up my phone.
translation.de: Mist. Ich muss los. Johno müllt mein Handy zu.

translation.en: Hey, you should come by the office, test out some new flavors.
translation.de: Komm doch mal vorbei, probier unsere neuen Sorten.

translation.en: We're doing cumin. I know how much you like Indian food.
translation.de: Wir haben jetzt Kumin. Du isst doch gern indisch.

translation.en: Sure. Sounds good.
It looks good on you, by the way.
The extra weight.
Yeah. Hey. I'm on my way, bro.
You guys ordering pizzas?
Yeah, don't dick me over like last time. Gluten-free crust.
Not from that vegan place. Vegan cheese tastes like asshole.
translation.de: Nicht vegan. Veganer Käse schmeckt scheiße.

translation.en: [Benji] I'm talking French gourmet shit.
No. Johno. Johno. Listen to me.
They can't do half-gluten-free 'cause it's dough.
translation.de: Halb glutenfrei geht nicht bei Teig.

translation.en: They have to use a spelt dough.
[Joe] So you didn't finish.
Just like that.
Thank you. You're so kind. [chuckles]
I don't suppose you can help me get a cab, can you?
translation.de: Ob Sie mir wohl auch ein Taxi rufen könnten?

translation.en: Of course.
-Thanks. -Yeah.
Wow. Don't tell me you're finished already.
translation.de: Jetzt sag nicht, dass du es schon ausgelesen hast.

translation.en: Almost.
It's so good.
Sometimes the dialogue's weird, though.
Like when they're killing each other and still all nice about it.
translation.de: Sie bringen sich um und sind immer noch nett.

translation.en: Well, it was the 19th century. People still had manners.
translation.de: Im 19. Jahrhundert hatten die Leute noch Manieren.

translation.en: I was hoping we could go get another one.
translation.de: Ich hatte gehofft, wir holen noch eins.

translation.en: [sighs] I mean, it's pretty late, Pac. I don't know.
translation.de: Es ist spät. Ich weiß nicht.

translation.en: [Claudia moaning] Oh, yeah.
I want you to cum...
[Joe] Something's in the air tonight, Beck, 'cause everyone but me is getting action.
translation.de: Es liegt was in der Luft, Beck, alle kommen zum Zug, außer mir.

translation.en: Even the lovebirds made up.
translation.de: Sogar die Turteltauben haben sich versöhnt.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, why not? Sure.
[Paco] Did you know Dumas was a black dude? I googled him.
translation.de: Wusstest du, dass Dumas schwarz war? Habe ich gegoogelt.

translation.en: His grandmother was a slave, and his dad was a brigadier general.
translation.de: Seine Oma war Sklavin, sein Vater Brigadegeneral.

translation.en: He killed like half a battalion.
translation.de: Er brachte ein halbes Bataillon um.

translation.en: You probably knew that since you work at a bookstore.
translation.de: Als Buchhändler wusstest du das sicher.

translation.en: I didn't.
-How'd you get to work here, anyway? -Mr. Mooney gave me a job
translation.de: -Wie bist du an den Job gekommen? -Über Mr. Mooney,

translation.en: when I was just a little older than you. He sort of took me in.
translation.de: ich war kaum älter als du. Er nahm mich auf.

translation.en: -He seems nice. -He's a dick.
translation.de: -Er ist sicher nett. -Er ist ein Arsch.

translation.en: But he loved books, and he taught me to love them, too.
translation.de: Aber er liebte Bücher und gab das an mich weiter.

translation.en: I never see him around here.
-Is he dead? -No. He's just old.
I'm sorry, Pac.
I had one back here for you, but Ethan must've sold it.
translation.de: Ich hatte eins, Ethan hat es verkauft.

translation.en: -Sold what? -Your next read.
Come on. I'll show you where we keep the good stuff.
translation.de: Ich zeige dir, wo die guten Sachen liegen.

translation.en: [Paco] Freaky.
It's the Cage.
It's where we keep early editions and collectibles.
It's cold.
Sixty-five degrees. For the books.
If the zombies come, this is where I'm hiding.
translation.de: Hier verstecke ich mich vor den Zombies.

translation.en: Why don't you set that milkshake down?
[Mooney] Careful, Joseph.
When it comes to the value of a book, it's all about condition. I'll show you.
translation.de: Der Zustand bestimmt den Wert eines Buchs. Ich zeige es dir.

translation.en: [Joe] It's always 65 degrees.
Humidity 40%. Too moist, the pages can mildew...
translation.de: Feuchtigkeit 40 %. Zu feucht, und die Seiten modern.

translation.en: [Mooney] Too dry, they get brittle.
translation.de: Zu trocken, und sie werden brüchig.

translation.en: Always keep books upright
so the spines don't become rolled or warped or what we call "cocked."
translation.de: damit sich die Rücken nicht verbiegen oder verziehen.

translation.en: And we never wanna fold or crease the pages.
translation.de: Und wir falten oder knicken nie die Seiten.

translation.en: And we dust the covers with a chemical-free duster.
Always towards the spine.
Under no circumstances is there any sunlight in this room.
translation.de: Unter keinen Umständen fällt Sonnenlicht in diesen Raum.

translation.en: Sunlight can ruin a book as fast as fire.
translation.de: Es ruiniert Bücher so schnell wie Feuer.

translation.en: Faster.
That's a lot of stuff to remember just to take care of some old books.
translation.de: Ziemlich viele Regeln für ein paar alte Bücher.

translation.en: The most valuable things in life are usually...
translation.de: Die wertvollsten Dinge im Leben sind häufig...

translation.en: the most helpless.
So they need people like us to protect them. You know?
translation.de: Sie brauchen Leute wie uns, um sie zu beschützen.

translation.en: "Don Quicks-oat."
Quixote. It's about a guy who believes in chivalry,
translation.de: Quixote. Ein Typ, der an Galanterie glaubte

translation.en: so he decides to be an old-school knight.
What's chivalry?
It's treating people with respect. Especially women. Like men should.
translation.de: Respekt zeigen. Besonders Frauen. Wie sich das gehört.

translation.en: It's good. It's one of my favorites.
I probably shouldn't take this home.
translation.de: Ich nehme es besser nicht mit.

translation.en: It's not a first edition, it's just an old one.
Besides, I trust you.
-Where you been, Paco? -We just grabbed some milkshakes.
-You just walk off with strangers? -Joe's not a stranger.
translation.de: -Gehst du jetzt mit Fremden mit? -Joe ist kein Fremder.

translation.en: Yes, he is.
Inside. Now. Okay?
Keep away from my girlfriend's kid.
Look, I'm sorry, but he was out here, and he could hear everything in there.
translation.de: Er war hier draußen und konnte alles mithören.

translation.en: Don't you tell me how to parent.
This whole nice guy act might work on other people.
translation.de: Vielleicht klappt deine Masche bei anderen.

translation.en: I'm a parole officer, 15 years, and I can see what you are.
translation.de: Ich bin Bewährungshelfer, ich durchschaue dich.

translation.en: [Joe] Well, you're an alcoholic shitbag who beats women.
translation.de: Du bist Alkoholiker und schlägst Frauen.

translation.en: So, please, enlighten me.
You're a freak.
So, stay away from Paco, because if you don't,
I'll grab a steak knife and I'll cut those freak eyes out.
translation.de: oder ich steche dir deine irren Augen aus.

translation.en: [Joe] There are scary people in the world, Beck.
That's why it's important to be safe.
And why I have to do what I'm about to do.
translation.de: Und darum muss ich tun, was ich tue.

translation.en: Fun fact.
Did you know the law requires gas leaks to be investigated?
translation.de: Wusstest du, dass Gaslecks überprüft werden müssen?

translation.en: I've been learning a lot since I met you.
translation.de: Ich lerne viel, seit ich dich traf.

translation.en: Hey, Beck? You left the door open again.
translation.de: Hey, Beck? Die Tür ist wieder offen.

translation.en: I thought we said we weren't gonna do that anymore.
I was careful to call the gas company on a day when you had a full schedule.
translation.de: Ich rief die Gaswerke an, als du zu tun hattest.

translation.en: I wouldn't wanna scare you.
Hey. Is Beck here?
Nope. Super let me in. Someone reported a leak.
translation.de: Der Hausmeister ließ mich rein. Es geht um ein Leck.

translation.en: Right. Yeah. She mentioned that. Is everything okay?
translation.de: Das hat sie erwähnt. Alles ok?

translation.en: Yeah, all clear. Tell your girlfriend there's no leak.
translation.de: Kein Leck. Sag das deiner Freundin.

translation.en: I'm done, so...
Okay. Thanks. Well, I can just lock up.
I just need to know who you really are.
translation.de: Ich muss nur wissen, wer du bist.

translation.en: Besides a broke poetry student
in a subsidized apartment you could never afford.
translation.de: und Mieterin einer Wohnung, die du dir nie leisten könntest.

translation.en: Where is it, Beck?
When we live together, your place won't be a pigsty.
translation.de: Wenn wir zusammen wohnen, ist das kein Saustall mehr.

translation.en: I'll clean for us.
And you won't eat all this frozen shit. I'll cook for you every day. I promise.
translation.de: Und du brauchst keinen Tiefkühlkram. Ich koche jeden Tag. Versprochen.

translation.en: I'll even do your laundry.
And take care of your favorite books.
I'll make our bed every morning.
translation.de: Ich mache jeden Morgen unser Bett.

translation.en: Oh, there it is.
And no matter how hard you fight me,
I will always make sure you password protect your devices.
translation.de: sorge ich dafür, dass du deine Geräte mit Passwörtern schützt.

translation.en: [Leahy] "One day You won't need love anymore
translation.de: "Eines Tages brauchst du Die Liebe nicht mehr

translation.en: One day, you won't walk through the world
translation.de: Dann gehst du nicht mehr durch die Welt

translation.en: As though it was your job To hold everything up
translation.de: Als sei es an dir Alles aufrechtzuerhalten

translation.en: The sun, the sky The hard part of the night"
translation.de: Die Sonne, den Himmel Und die Tiefen der Nacht"

translation.en: It's good.
It's quite good.
But, Beck, where's the rest? You owe me 20 more pages.
translation.de: Aber wo ist der Rest? Ich kriege noch 20 Seiten.

translation.en: [sighs] I've been, honestly, working every day, and grading papers--
translation.de: Ich arbeite rund um die Uhr, ich korrigiere Arbeiten...

translation.en: If the schedule is too rigorous, drop back to part-time.
But then I won't qualify to TA.
I need the cash. The housing. I'd lose my place.
translation.de: Ich brauche das Geld. Die Wohnung wäre ich auch los.

translation.en: You'll figure it out. You're smart, or you wouldn't be here.
translation.de: Du schaffst das. Du bist klug.

translation.en: -Please, Professor Leahy-- -Paul.
Paul. I'll get you the pages by the end of the week.
translation.de: Paul. Ich bringe Ihnen alles bis Ende der Woche.

translation.en: I can't go to part-time, okay?
translation.de: Ich kann nicht Teilzeit arbeiten, ok?

translation.en: [sighs] I'm rooting for you.
You just need to keep up.
Happy to discuss further. After class some evening.
translation.de: Wir können gern weiterreden. Abends, nach dem Unterricht.

translation.en: If we're gonna seriously discuss poetry, it should be over a drink.
translation.de: Zu einem echten Gespräch über Lyrik gehört ein Drink.

translation.en: There's a little gastropub I love...
I would love that, Paul. [chuckles]
Just, uh, how would your wife feel about you--
translation.de: Aber was würde Ihre Frau denken...

translation.en: About me helping out an aspiring writer? She's used to my generosity.
translation.de: Ich helfe einer begabten Schriftstellerin. Sie kennt meine Großzügigkeit.

translation.en: [Leahy] So, Thursday night, then?
Thursday night it is.
Excellent.
And don't worry about the next few days. Just go home and get caught up.
translation.de: Mach dir keine Gedanken. Geh heim und schreib.

translation.en: [Beck] Need to see you tonight.
[Benji] Will if I can, babe. Working late.
translation.de: Wenn ich es schaffe. Viel zu tun.

translation.en: P.S., I can still smell you on my fingers.
translation.de: P.S. Meine Finger riechen noch nach dir.

translation.en: [Joe] I learned two definitive things by scouring your computer.
translation.de: Ich habe aus deinem Computer zwei Sachen gelernt.

translation.en: First, there are no recent pictures of your dad because he's dead.
translation.de: Es gibt keine neuen Bilder deines Vaters, weil er tot ist.

translation.en: He OD'd and you were the one that found him.
translation.de: Er starb an einer Überdosis, du hast ihn gefunden.

translation.en: You've started a few poems about that day, but you never finished them.
translation.de: Du hast ein paar Gedichte dazu angefangen, aber nie beendet.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Beck.
But none of this matters because of my second and greatest discovery.
translation.de: Aber das ist alles unwichtig angesichts meiner zweiten Entdeckung.

translation.en: 11:06 a.m., an hour after our encounter at the bookstore,
translation.de: Um 11:06 Uhr, eine Stunde nach unserer Begegnung,

translation.en: amidst a group text on the merits of vaginal detoxing, you wrote...
translation.de: schriebst du in einem Gruppenchat über Vaginalentgiftung...

translation.en: [Beck] Wow. Just met a human male who actually reads.
translation.de: Wow. Habe gerade einen Mann getroffen, der liest.

translation.en: Alert the media.
What if it's finally time for me to date someone good for me?
translation.de: Ist die Zeit reif für einen, der mir guttut?

translation.en: [Joe] Thank you for letting me know -I wasn't crazy after all. -[door unlocks]
translation.de: Danke, jetzt weiß ich, dass ich nicht spinne.

translation.en: [Joe] No!
Yes, I remember what you said when you sent money last.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was du bei der letzten Überweisung sagtest.

translation.en: Yes, I'm grateful.
[scoffs] I'm working constantly. There's no place cheaper to live.
translation.de: Ich arbeite ständig. Es gibt keinen billigeren Wohnraum.

translation.en: I did. He basically offered to sleep with me.
translation.de: Habe ich ja. Er wollte mit mir schlafen.

translation.en: No, I can't report him. That's not how it works.
translation.de: Anzeigen geht nicht. So läuft das nicht.

translation.en: [Joe] I'm not worried. I've seen enough romantic comedies
to know guys like me are always getting in jams like this.
translation.de: geraten Typen wie ich immer in solche Lagen.

translation.en: Not the school, the world. That's not how the world works.
translation.de: Nicht nur an der Uni, überhaupt. So läuft es nicht.

translation.en: I know how much you helped me, it's just... It's hard here, Mom.
translation.de: Ich weiß, wie du mir geholfen hast. Es ist eben schwer hier, Mom.

translation.en: Okay. I'll figure it out.
All right. Love you, too.
Bye, Mom.
[Joe] It's okay, Beck.
Hey, bitch, where you at? Come play!
translation.de: Bitch, wo bist du? Komm spielen!

translation.en: I can't. I just had the worst day.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht. Ganz schlechter Tag.

translation.en: -What happened? -Aw. Beckalicious, whatever it is,
there's nothing that we can't fix, okay?
Yes, us and copious amounts of alcohol. -[Peach] Oh, my God. There's a sale! -[chuckles]
translation.de: -Ja, wir und viel Alkohol. -Es gibt einen Ausverkauf!

translation.en: -You guys love me? -[Peach] Of course.
-[Lynn] Why would you even say that? -[Beck] Okay, then.
Meet me in Greenpoint.
Look, why don't you come here? Okay? Come here.
[Lynn] It's actually really fun where we are.
[Peach] Yeah.
There's something I need to do for myself.
translation.de: Ich muss etwas für mich tun.

translation.en: I'll text you on my way.
See you soon.
-Bye! -Bye!
[sighs] Fuck!
[Joe] I guess we're going to Greenpoint, Beck.
I never go to Greenpoint.
But the things you do for love, right?
translation.de: Aber was tut man nicht aus Liebe?

translation.en: [Beck] Hi. Um, okay, we're gonna get a few more drinks.
translation.de: Ok, wir bestellen erst noch etwas.

translation.en: Hold on, one second.
Guys?
[Peach] What is she thinking?
Open mics are for models-slash- singer-songwriters-slash-vegans.
translation.de: Offene Bühnen sind für Models, Sängerinnen oder Veganer.

translation.en: These people don't want to hear
some wannabe read a poem about the bleakness of life or whatever.
translation.de: keine Tussi mit Gedichten über das harte Leben.

translation.en: [Joe] Your friends are disloyal. And that Peach is the worst.
translation.de: Deine Freundinnen sind illoyal. Peach ist die schlimmste.

translation.en: -[yells] Ooh. -Another round of picklebacks.
Beckish, do we think now's the night?
Positive.
All of my life lately has been about surviving.
I need to remind myself why I came here in the first place.
translation.de: Ich muss wieder wissen, warum ich überhaupt hier bin.

translation.en: -Yes. -Yeah.
-You go. So good. -Who do you keep texting?
I invited Benji.
-Beck... -What? He likes poetry.
-For sure. -And he texted he was coming?
He texted a row of smile emojis, like, 45 minutes ago.
translation.de: Er schickte eine Zeile Strahlesmileys, vor 45 Minuten.

translation.en: Some guys are assholes, and you just have to realize that.
translation.de: Es gibt eben Arschlöcher, kapier das mal.

translation.en: I get it, Peach.
You're the one who told me to keep reminding you he's a bastard.
translation.de: Ich soll dich erinnern, dass er ein Bastard ist.

translation.en: Up next, we have Guinevere Beck.
-All right. -All right.
To vulnerability and shit!
-Cheers. -Okay.
[Annika] Kill it, Beck!
Hey, everyone. Um, I'm Beck, and I'm... [chuckles]
translation.de: Hallo zusammen. Ich bin Beck und...

translation.en: Not to sound like, you know, whatever, but just...
translation.de: Vielleicht klingt das... Na ja, ich...

translation.en: I'm a poet.
Yeah, you are!
[Lynn] Yeah, you are!
"One day, you won't need love anymore
translation.de: "Eines Tages brauchst du Die Liebe nicht mehr

translation.en: One day, you won't walk through the world
translation.de: Dann gehst du nicht mehr durch die Welt

translation.en: As though it was your job To hold everything up
translation.de: Als sei es an dir Alles aufrechtzuerhalten

translation.en: The sun, the hard part of the night
translation.de: Die Sonne, die Tiefen der Nacht

translation.en: The secret time when you wake To the sound of beating
translation.de: Die geheime Zeit Da du zu einem Pochen erwachst

translation.en: Rise to answer the door But he's not there
translation.de: Aufstehst, um zu öffnen Aber er ist nicht da

translation.en: Because that sound is coming From inside you
translation.de: Denn der Klang Kommt aus dir

translation.en: And you cannot answer it No matter how far in you go"
translation.de: Und du kannst nichts öffnen Egal, wie tief du hineingehst

translation.en: "You loved him the way Fragile kids love gorgeous bullies
translation.de: Du hast ihn geliebt Wie schwache Kinder die Schlägertypen

translation.en: -You wrote songs about him. You..." -[cymbals crash] Uh, I mean... [chuckles softly]
translation.de: Hast Songs über ihn geschrieben. Du..." Ich meine...

translation.en: "You wrote poems about him
You still write poems about him You're writing one right now"
translation.de: Du schreibst sie noch immer Eins schreibst du jetzt"

translation.en: [man] Why're you so sad? You're just so sad.
translation.de: Warum bist du so traurig? Echt voll traurig.

translation.en: Just something happier, for a change, might be nice.
translation.de: Was Fröhlicheres wäre zur Abwechslung ganz nett.

translation.en: I think everyone agrees. Get the singer back.
translation.de: Das dürften alle so sehen. Holt die Sängerin zurück.

translation.en: [stuttering] Sorry. I just... I lost my place.
translation.de: Tut mir leid... Ich habe die Zeile verloren.

translation.en: It'll just take a second to find where I was.
[Joe] I can't stand seeing this. I'm sorry. I just can't.
translation.de: Ich kann das nicht mit ansehen. Es geht nicht.

translation.en: It's obvious what you are. You're blind with love.
translation.de: Es ist ganz klar: Du bist blind vor Liebe.

translation.en: And what you love, writing, this city, your friends,
translation.de: Und dem, was du liebst, dem Schreiben, der Stadt, den Freunden,

translation.en: most of all, men like Benji,
what all those have in common is they will never love you back.
translation.de: ist gemeinsam, deine Liebe nie zu erwidern.

translation.en: While you give everything.
It's crazy the lengths we go. We're a lot alike, Beck.
translation.de: Wir gehen sehr weit. Wir ähneln uns sehr.

translation.en: Last of the true romantics.
[homeless man] ♪ Engine Engine number nine ♪
♪ On the New York transit line... ♪
[Joe] I was considering this with my new friend, Mr. Bat-Shit Homeless Guy,
translation.de: Ich erörterte das gerade mit Herrn Megagestört,

translation.en: when the second luckiest thing this week happened.
translation.de: als sich der zweitgrößte Glücksfall der Woche ereignete.

translation.en: Could it really be?
It feels like I'm dreaming.
I'm not.
Beck, you're too drunk to be alone.
translation.de: Du bist zu betrunken, um allein zu sein.

translation.en: What if some sicko had followed you down here?
translation.de: Und wenn dir ein Psychopath gefolgt wäre?

translation.en: And you're too wasted to be standing so close to the tracks.
translation.de: Du bist zu fertig, um so nah am Gleis zu stehen.

translation.en: Beck! Beck, stop texting that arrogant club-soda, no-show dickhead.
translation.de: Hör auf, diesem arroganten Limonadenheini zu schreiben. WO WARST DU?

translation.en: ♪ If my train jump off the track ♪
translation.de: Wenn der Zug aus dem Gleis springt

translation.en: [Joe] You want Benji.
You need Benji. You hold that phone like it is Benji,
translation.de: Du brauchst Benji. Du hältst das Telefon,

translation.en: 'cause it's your only means to stay connected.
translation.de: weil nur das dich mit ihm verbindet.

translation.en: Forget Benji.
And to hell with that phone.
[homeless man] ♪ Pick it up! Pick it up! Pick it up... ♪
♪ Engine, engine number nine ♪
♪ On the New York transit line... ♪
You okay? Are you all right? Can you stand up?
translation.de: Ist alles ok? Kannst du aufstehen?

translation.en: Just stay still.
Half that shit down there can electrocute you, all right,
translation.de: Das Elektrik da kann dich töten,

translation.en: so just give me your hand.
[homeless man] ♪ Pick it up! Pick it up! ♪ ♪ Pick it up! Pick it up... ♪
Sir, please, shut up!
Give me your hand.
Train's coming.
Your hand! Now!
-Oh, my God. Oh, my God. I am so sorry. -Whoo.
translation.de: Oh Gott, es tut mir so leid.

translation.en: No, it's fine. It's fine.
I, uh, hated... I hated this jacket. Ugh.
translation.de: Ich... mochte die Jacke eh nicht.

translation.en: -I really am sorry. -It's okay.
You mind?
Sure, um...
You know what? Let's get you in a cab. All right?
translation.de: Ich setzte dich jetzt in ein Taxi. Ok?

translation.en: I'm not always like this.
I figured you had some kind of night.
Some kind of.
Hey, I don't want to sound like a stalker, but...
translation.de: Ich klinge wie eine Stalkerin, aber...

translation.en: I think I know you.
Oh, the... Right. [chuckles] Of course.
I remember. I'm sorry.
This is what I look like when I'm sober and have my hair up.
translation.de: So sehe ich nüchtern und mit Hochsteckfrisur aus.

translation.en: Yeah. No, I... I remember.
It's okay, I have a pretty bland face.
translation.de: Schon gut, ich habe ein Allerweltsgesicht.

translation.en: No, you don't.
Yeah, uh, Desperate Characters. I remember.
translation.de: Was am Ende bleibt. Ich erinnere mich.

translation.en: Yeah.
Where are you headed?
Village. You anywhere close?
translation.de: Village. Wohnst du in der Nähe?

translation.en: Ride with me. It's the least I can do.
translation.de: Fahr mit. Das ist das Mindeste.

translation.en: Did you move here to be something? I did. But it's not working out.
translation.de: Wolltest du hier etwas werden? Ich ja. Funktioniert nicht.

translation.en: And I'm just running around 18 hours a day. Why?
translation.de: Ich schufte 18 Stunden am Tag. Warum?

translation.en: Oh, God! Never mind. Sorry.
translation.de: Himmel! Vergiss es. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: No, please. I feel the same way sometimes.
translation.de: Nein. Mir geht es manchmal auch so.

translation.en: This guy I know, he owns the bookstore.
He once told me that all books add up to one essential truth.
translation.de: Der sagte mir mal, alle Bücher würden nur eine Wahrheit verkünden.

translation.en: Which is, if your IQ is above a certain number...
translation.de: Und zwar, dass jenseits eines gewissen IQ

translation.en: life is pretty much unbearable. And the number is not even that high.
translation.de: das Leben unerträglich wird. Die Latte liegt nicht mal hoch.

translation.en: [chuckles] I do think I'd be happier if I was stupider.
translation.de: Wäre ich dümmer, wäre ich tatsächlich glücklicher.

translation.en: [chuckles] But then the world wouldn't know your poetry.
translation.de: Aber es gäbe deine Gedichte nicht.

translation.en: How'd you know I write poetry?
translation.de: Woher weißt du, dass ich Lyrik schreibe?

translation.en: Doesn't every young writer in New York?
translation.de: Tun das nicht alle jungen Schriftsteller?

translation.en: I mean, I read a lot of poetry.
Who do you like?
You're describing my nightstand.
[scoffs] Well, if you read them to get to sleep every night,
translation.de: Wenn du die zum Einschlafen liest,

translation.en: then you definitely belong here.
-What was your last name again? -Goldberg.
Where did you come from, Joe Goldberg?
translation.de: Und wo kommst du her, Joe Goldberg?

translation.en: I grew up here.
I left for a little while. Chasing a girl.
translation.de: Ich war kurz weg. Ich jagte einem Mädchen hinterher.

translation.en: -But you came back? -Yeah, I missed it.
And I'm not a good chaser.
translation.de: Und ich bin kein guter Jäger.

translation.en: [sighs] Me neither.
Oh, this is, uh... This is me.
Mmm-hmm. It's not bad.
Thank you for sobering me up.
And for saving my life.
No, I didn't... I didn't save your life.
translation.de: Ich habe dir nicht das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: Yeah, you did.
Oh, God.
[Joe] Of course.
-Benji. -[Beck] Hi.
Um, this is Joe. He literally saved my life tonight.
translation.de: Das ist Joe. Er hat mir das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: I... I fell on the tracks. It was crazy.
translation.de: Ich bin aufs Gleis gestürzt. Voll krass.

translation.en: Babe, I told you people are basically good.
translation.de: Ich sagte dir doch, Menschen sind gut.

translation.en: It's a great job, bro.
[Joe] "Bro." You waste of hair.
Okay. Beck, it's freezing out here.
-Wait. Maybe I can get your info... -Yeah. Um...
Shit!
My phone!
-I must've dropped it in the subway. -Oh.
translation.de: Das liegt wohl noch in der Station.

translation.en: Uh, okay, well. Just maybe give me your number,
translation.de: Dann gib mir eben deine Nummer,

translation.en: for when you get a replacement.
I'm basically enslaved to e-mail.
[Joe] I get it. Smart. I'm practically a stranger. Can't be too careful.
translation.de: Klar. Schlau. Ich bin ein Fremder. Vorsicht ist geboten.

translation.en: It's BeckInRealLife@gmail.com
-[typing] -All right.
Thank you.
[Joe] Here's what I learned this week. [Benji] Sorry I didn't make it, you know?
[Joe] You are special. You're talented. You're passionate.
translation.de: Du bist besonders. Du bist talentiert. Und leidenschaftlich.

translation.en: You're smart.
Except in the ways you are really not. Like not locking your phone.
translation.de: Außer in bestimmter Hinsicht. Wenn du dein Telefon nicht schützt.

translation.en: And falling for men like Benji. You know better, but you can't stop.
translation.de: Oder dich in Benji verliebst. Du weißt es besser, kannst aber nicht anders.

translation.en: Because, well, because everyone needs someone.
translation.de: Weil... Weil wir alle jemanden brauchen.

translation.en: What you really need is someone to save you.
translation.de: Du brauchst jemanden, der dich rettet.

translation.en: I can help, Beck. Let me help you.
translation.de: Ich kann das. Lass mich dir helfen.

translation.en: [Paco] Joe.
What's going on? What're you doing out here?
translation.de: Was ist? Was machst du hier?

translation.en: It's Ron.
He came home drunk.
He started yelling.
Saying I thought I was smart,
translation.de: Ich würde mich für schlau halten

translation.en: reading my books and looking at him like he's dumb.
translation.de: mit meinen Büchern und auf ihn herabsehen.

translation.en: What happened? Did he hurt you?
translation.de: Was ist passiert? Hat er dir wehgetan?

translation.en: No, he didn't touch me.
I tried to stop him...
-I'm sorry. -Paco.
Paco, it's okay. Really. It's okay.
translation.de: Paco, das ist schon ok. Echt.

translation.en: You know what? Come with me. We can fix this together. All right?
translation.de: Komm mit. Wir reparieren es zusammen.

translation.en: So, the first step to fixing something
translation.de: Jede Reparatur fängt mit dem Wissen an,

translation.en: is to know no matter how destroyed it seems, it can always be saved.
translation.de: dass alles gerettet werden kann, egal, wie kaputt es erscheint.

translation.en: Books are no exception. You got it?
Got it.
So what we have here is a lying press. Basically just a huge clamp.
translation.de: Hier haben wir eine Buchpresse. Eine Art riesige Schraubzwinge.

translation.en: Polyvinyl-acetate glue,
means no acid to burn the pages. Got your needle, thread,
translation.de: damit keine Säure ans Papier kommt. Weiterhin Nadel, Faden...

translation.en: and finally, right out of Bugs Bunny...
a trusty mallet.
You see this?
We don't need this.
[Benji] Johno! Listen to this.
"Dear Benji, heard about your soda.
Am interested in including you on my fall list of must-tries.
Would love to discuss. Perhaps even try some? Jeff Pevensey."
translation.de: Würde gern quatschen. Oder probieren? Jeff Pevensey."

translation.en: That's the dude you're always retweeting?
translation.de: Den tweetest du doch immer weiter?

translation.en: It's the culture guy from New York magazine.
translation.de: Der ist Kulturfuzzi beim Magazin New York.

translation.en: Hit him back, bro.
No shit. Back off while I think.
Jeff, comma, so nice to hear from you, bud, period.
translation.de: Jeff, Komma, freut mich, von dir zu hören, Punkt.

translation.en: Yeah, our sodas are legit, period.
I would love to meet up to have you try the goods, period.
translation.de: Würde mich freuen, wenn du mal probierst, Punkt.

translation.en: Let's set something up.
Scrape carefully along the spine.
Of course, you've got to watch your fingers.
"Sounds great. I can call between meetings to see if you're available."
translation.de: "Klingt gut. Ich rufe durch, vielleicht bist du ja da."

translation.en: This is gonna take us next level.
translation.de: Damit zünden wir die nächste Stufe.

translation.en: What time do you think we'll meet?
No offense, we discussed this.
translation.de: Sei nicht böse, wir haben das beredet.

translation.en: It's best if the product has one clear face at the beginning.
translation.de: Am Anfang braucht das Produkt ein Gesicht.

translation.en: That's just more me.
translation.de: Und das ist nun mal meins.

translation.en: [Joe] Okay, the spine is sewn.
So you take this, pull it as tight as you can, that way.
translation.de: Nimm das und zieh, so fest du kannst.

translation.en: Yeah. That's it.
The glue is set. We've applied the binder.
translation.de: Der Leim ist verteilt. Der Einband liegt auf.

translation.en: Now...
you gotta be precise, and use exactly the force needed.
translation.de: ...braucht es Präzision und genau die richtige Kraft.

translation.en: Hey, man. Jeff. Nice to meet you, man.
translation.de: Grüß dich, Jeff. Schön, dich zu treffen.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, too. Have you been here before?
translation.de: Finde ich auch. Schon mal hier gewesen?

translation.en: It's a... Not a lot of people know about it yet.
It's an incredible after-hours. Very exclusive.
translation.de: Eine unglaublich gute After-Hours-Bar. Sehr exklusiv.

translation.en: Yeah, I've been here a couple of times.
translation.de: Ich war ein paar Mal hier.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Hmm.
Oh. Well, good.
So you'll feel right at home, then.
translation.de: Dann fühlst du dich ja zu Hause.

translation.en: Please, after you.
All right.
It's just down. To the left.
Hey, man, I'm thinking maybe...
[Joe] It's 2:00 p.m. when the door chimes, and I'm ready.
translation.de: Um 14 Uhr geht die Türklingel, und ich bin bereit.

translation.en: You told your girlfriends you'd come by. I know this because I have your phone.
translation.de: Du hast es angekündigt. Ich weiß es aus deinem Telefon.

translation.en: -I'll be back. -[Joe] Okay.
Remember me? From almost dying on the train tracks? [chuckles]
translation.de: Du erinnerst dich? Lebensrettung vom Gleis?

translation.en: Uh, it rings a bell. Hang on. Hang on.
I wanted to say thank you.
No. You already did that.
Well, uh, thanks again. [chuckles]
And I'm sorry for, uh, running off the other night.
translation.de: Es tut mir auch leid, dass ich so davongerannt bin.

translation.en: -You had a guest. -Hardly.
So, I got you a present.
translation.de: Ich habe ein Geschenk für dich.

translation.en: No, please. You don't have to get me anything.
Shut up and just look at it.
"Engine, engine number nine On the New York transit line
translation.de: "Lok, Lok Nummer Neun Von der New Yorker Transitlinie

translation.en: If your girl falls on the track Pick her up, pick her up, pick her up"
translation.de: Wenn dein Mädchen fällt aufs Gleis Heb sie, heb sie, heb sie auf"

translation.en: [Joe] We already have in-jokes.
So...
anyway, that. And I better--
Maybe if you're not too busy, we could get a drink sometime?
translation.de: Wenn du nicht zu viel zu tun hast, könnten wir mal was trinken?

translation.en: Sure.
Ugh. But I still can't find my phone.
translation.de: Ich habe mein Telefon noch nicht.

translation.en: I know. E-mail.
That's right.
See ya, Joe.
See you soon, Beck.
Well played, sir.
Well played.
[Joe] I'm not always right. I'm human. I make mistakes.
translation.de: Ich habe nicht immer recht. Auch ich mache Fehler.

translation.en: You'll see.
I have to check on a shipment downstairs.
translation.de: Ich muss unten eine Lieferung prüfen.

translation.en: -Can you watch the register? -Yeah.
[Joe] Hell, maybe I'm just a fool in love...
translation.de: Vielleicht bin ich nur ein verliebter Idiot...

translation.en: but I'm right about you,
and I'm going to help you get the life you deserve, Beck.
translation.de: ich verhelfe dir zu dem Leben, das du verdienst.

translation.en: Please.
Whatever you think I did, you got the wrong guy.
translation.de: Was Sie mir auch vorwerfen, Sie haben den Falschen.

translation.en: No.
I don't.
